tweets.text:
"The site has been breached for discharges from storm tanks during non-storm conditions."

In English. Berkhamsted STW is operating illegally by dumping sewage into the River Bulbourne, a chalk stream, 1 of only 225 in the entire world.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/SCyPhZUuaR
This is upsetting and concerning. The air was very bad over the weekend. It‚Äôs really nasty again tonight. @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg https://t.co/fTBO705OCq
@Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency https://t.co/na2wJQwaHG
Thanks for nothing @EnvAgency it stinks in #newcastleunderlyme tonight. @StinkStopthe

@garethbirddj @Calderdale @EnvAgencyYNE @YorkshireWater Hi Gareth, we are sorry to see this. Unfortunately the River Calder does not come under our care. Hopefully the Environment Agency can help, there is also the Calder Rivers Trust - https://t.co/L62dqj6qo1

@MrMarkwarren1 @poppers82 @DrAmirKhanGP @sabinashaw20 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL No wonder that house is for sale, don't know how poor souls sell it, whole town needs evacuating.

I don‚Äôt think anyone understands why it‚Äôs allowed to continue. The only answer we can come up with for some illogical and unsafe decision making is money. Wealth before health @Cap_it_off  @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/dWnPdI6WVs

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids There is something going on it‚Äôs evening early morning and weekends, what are they able to do in operating hours that they can‚Äôt do when there not? As there is definitely something going on and we are suffocating with it
@RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids Why is it always worse at weekend? This cannot be a coincidence, it's every weekend!

@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe RED have applied to increase work at Sneyd Hill Ind Estate.
@EnvAgencyMids SAY NO! The smell from there is already ghastly & has need been reported on before It drifts across High Lane, Stanfields (School & Hospital) & Acreswood. No more stink!
@HelenVi00175623 @DrMickSalt @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA It‚Äôs the equivalent of la la la I can‚Äôt hear you .

@HelenVi00175623 @DrMickSalt @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe The consultation was then basically saying we‚Äôre doing this , you won‚Äôt do anything as you‚Äôre scared of us . It‚Äôs an utter joke so is the environment ruining agency . I can‚Äôt even be bothered tagging them anymore the damn clowns .
@Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink https://t.co/KFuWVFmGGS

tweets.text:
I've heard the @EnvAgency are surprised NGOs are refusing to work with them.

Why?

The River Avon catchment is comprised of 5 chalk streams protected as SSSI and SAC. In 2020 @wessexwater spent 26,916 hours dumping sewage into the river.

https://t.co/zslGdsV3lC

tweets.text:
Walleys Quarry landfill will be restarting ‚Äòfull operations‚Äô from Monday. 

Red Industries says it‚Äôs been planned in full consultation with @EnvAgency

It put a pause on accepting most waste in March and has been found to have breached it‚Äôs permit 5 times since mid-Feb. https://t.co/AKbc0O8z43

Time to fight back. Higher than the @EnvAgency - @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice Shout until they listen. After that I‚Äôm afraid it‚Äôs @BorisJohnson Don‚Äôt want to bother him. He‚Äôs a busy man but what choice do we have ?! @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @MattHancock https://t.co/ClEPRR0CxO

tweets.text: @bakedpotatolady @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Seriously - I would oppose it tooth & nail. We are literally being poisoned in our beds in Newcastle & there‚Äôs no real appetite for sorting it out. Constantly fighting, it‚Äôs awful. Keep them contained as much as you can

@StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off the fight back begins , We should start leaving google reviews on all the companies We see using #WalleysQuarry more than once and not positive ones either .  That‚Äôs just the start as we need to hit them hard in the pocket .

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL Great news @SimonTagg . Take a look at the new landfill website.  It‚Äôs got some really interesting Information. https://t.co/Py3t6BtkzB

@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA  It may be complete but we are still breathing in poisonous gases. So what‚Äôs next? More statements or are you going to do the right thing and close it down? #StopTheStink

Today the team have worked with @EnvAgency & @AnglingTrust at #Hanningfieldresevoir to check for poaching & theft offences. Multiple licences checked with persons reported for not having rod licences. A good day of partnership working despite the üåß. @PCJedRaven https://t.co/YaM7cTVF1e

With the end of election publicity restrictions I am back as lead spokesperson for @NewsNBC our councillors and officers speak as one when we urge further action by @EnvAgencyMids to relieve the foul gas stink from Walleys Quarry landfill. @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/8gj36tg4D2

@davemh72 @DrMickSalt @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Even when we do they don't listen. This is @ClareDinnisEA currently ignoring anything she finds mildly inconvenient üôÑ
@StinkStopthe https://t.co/g0XsblTvjR

@njsc_10 @NewsNBC @SimonTagg As far as I'm aware, the gas extraction system is not currently connected. Happy to be corrected if it is. Although if I am wrong, & it is connected, then it's clearly not fit for purpose, given the high levels of landfill gases being detected by residents!

@nelliephant @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids My hunch is that they have been doing that here too to release the gas. The agencies who are checking how these landfill sites are being managed need to be more robust. Are the operators breaking the law? This needs to be investigated.

@nelliephant @SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids My theory is they are opening the wellheads on the gas extraction wells at night and releasing all the toxic gas and odours (despicable!). They should have a proper gas management system in place - to perhaps turn it into renewable energy.

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @Tus_M_ Thank you Simon&your council team for being out all hours.Your team were in our street last night.Can the abatement order not be served now with the complaints,breaches,@EnvAgency monitoring&latest statement serving as sufficient evidence?#stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL @Cap_it_off

@Feargal_Sharkey @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency Absolutely nothing ! Here in Newcastle under Lyme they‚Äôve let a private carrying accepting waste despite thousands of complaints a month , 1200 impact statements going in and an acknowledgement there‚Äôs a problem .
I am hearing that @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest may have finally seen sense!? @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife https://t.co/fAB6uuBlCW

Heard from sources that the @EnvAgency are planning to radically change their pollution response procedure. Will now only attend serious pollution incidents. Begs the question define serious & how would they know if they do not attend? Replace one broken system with another.

@PJennings88 @EnvAgency Oh here we go the @EnvAgency doing what they do best swerving the issues. They are not fit for purpose and should be replaced immediately with an agency that is proactive and actually use their powers to protect the environment. @JamesBevanEA get your act together.

@annjsmall @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA This morning I woke up and could actually smell fresh air ü§Ø then I realised someone else would be bearing the brunt of it. I am so sorry you have to endure this nearly all of the time. Who would believe it in 2021? Unbelievable!!

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids You need to get Boris up here and get the red industries owners in court and made to pay compensation to every resident affected we can smell it in bradwell most mornings around 5 especially if the wind is in this direction I've even smelt it along the A500 and by junction 16

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids How has it been allowed to spread this far over such a long time?? With this many complaints about it?? What is being hidden?? How much is at stake here?? And for who?? We are not stupid. Why is big business more important than kid‚Äôs health?? Our health seems unimportant?? Why??

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids If @EnvAgencyMids had not ignored residents complaints for so long it would not have got this bad.They are not fit for purpose and a independent enquiry needs to happen to find out why the issues at Walley‚Äôs Quarry was ignored for so many months/years @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink

@DeniseO97662017 @nelliephant @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids That‚Äôs interesting. We weren‚Äôt sure if it was coincidental at first but don‚Äôt see how it can be every single Friday night no matter what the weather!!

@a_merrydew @SianieRoo @davemh72 @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @Cap_it_off @JournoJess_ @StinkStopthe Really proud of our community ‚ù§Ô∏è and the same goes for you never suffer in silence chick ü•∞xx
